title: Former Sporting KC player Dovale helping in Spain's fight against coronavirus
description: Former Sporting Kansas City player Toni Dovale is working in his family's small pharmacy in northwestern Spain.
content:
MADRID Toni Dovale has a different routine from most Spanish soccer players during the coronavirus pandemic.
While some have been spending their time trying to stay fit or negotiating salary reductions with their clubs, Dovale is working to guarantee there a… [+4738 chars]
